name: Alistair Forsyth
title: CIO
notes: Sent $12K fixed contract. VHA sent contract back, Sean redlined. Was supposed to start Jan week 2. Budget issues — unexpected software renewal cost increases. On hold until March when budget recalibrates. Follow up March 1.

name: Felix Zhang
title: CIO
notes: Met Oct 2025. Presented context-aware triage bot. Felix connected with Patient Experience team. Prep call last Monday. Meeting Feb 18 3-4pm with senior exec attendees. Prototype: ED concierge for patient journey transparency. Multi-language (Cantonese, Tamil). Light wayfinding. Non-clinical escalation. Fixed-fee prototype + handoff + potential production.

name: Jeff Mainland
title: EVP
notes: Met Nov 2025, discussed working together. Met again late Jan 2026 — presented Activation Bridge, nurse workflow friction prototype, LUMEN. Very impressed. Meeting tomorrow Feb 2 at 11:45 ET to review AI budget and Microsoft proposal (pro bono). Next: present to Sandra Moro (Deputy CIO), Greg Kennedy (Chief Strategy Officer), Dr. Devin Singh (ER physician, SKAI co-lead).

name: Skerdi Cerga
title: CTO / CTSO
notes: Former colleague of Sean. MSc, CISSP. CTO since 2018. 3 hospitals (Mississauga, Queensway, Credit Valley). Featured in Technology Magazine. LinkedIn outreach sent Feb 2026.
